title: Sportsman's warehouse targets 2025 comps growth with focus on hunting and fishing

text: Earnings Call Insights: Sportsman's Warehouse Holdings (SPWH) Q4 2024 Management View CEO Paul Stone highlighted the completion of Phase 1 of the company's transformation strategy in 2024, which included resetting over 100 stores, enhancing merchandise displays, and improving inventory management. Earnings Call Insights: Sportsman's Warehouse Holdings (SPWH) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Paul Stone highlighted the completion of Phase 1 of the company's transformation strategy in 2024, which included resetting over 100 stores, enhancing merchandise displays, and improving inventory management. The company ended 2024
